澝字的基本解释

澝
nìng
同“泞”。

澝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nìng］
［《廣韻》乃定切，去徑，泥。］
［《廣韻》乃挺切，上迥，泥。］
“泞2”的繁体字。
泥浆；烂泥。
[②]［nì］
［《廣韻》奴計切，去霽，泥。］
“泞3”的繁体字。
(1)像烂泥一样地粘着。
(2)陷于泥中。
[③]［níng］
［《集韻》囊丁切，平青，泥。］
“泞4”的繁体字。

澝字的康熙字典解释
澝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
澝字的起名意思

同“泞”。

澝
Basic explanation of words
澝
nìng
Same as "泞".
澝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nìng］
["Guangyun" is fixed cutting, removing the path, and mud. ]
["Guangyun" is quite cut, on the top, and mud. ]
"泞2" in traditional characters.
Mud
[②]［nì］
["Guangyun" slave plan cut, go to Ji, mud. ]
"泞3" in traditional characters.
(1) Stick like mud.
(2) Get stuck in the mud.
[③]［níng］
["Jiyun" capsule cut, flat green, mud. ]
"泞4" in traditional characters.
澝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words

澝
Name meaning
Same as "泞".
nìng
mud; miry, muddy, stagnant
